A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is by far the worst Star Wars movie of them all folks.  Extremely disappointed in this film.

How did this film get a 93% or 8.1/10 average from critics?  I think it has become painfully obvious now that Disney has paid off the critics.

When was the last time you had a huge disconnect between the critics and the audience.  Audience is at 56% and I am sure it will continue to plummet once the paid reviewers stop posting.

Bottom line\, we can't trust the critics\, we can't trust Disney\, and I will never watch another Star Wars movie directed by Rian Johnson.
